name: Logitech Z906 500 W 5.1-Channel Speakers
Features: [THX Certified, Digital decoding, Easy-to-read control console, Ported, side-firing subwoofer, Wall-mountable satellites, Surround sound with 3D Stereo, Works with: - Computers, music players, TVs, Blu-ray and DVD players, game consoles and other audio sources with digital optical, digital coaxial, RCA audio or 3.5 mm out, - Nintendo Wii using the AV cable that comes with your console]
